name: Kill The Blobs
description:
In this game u have to find your way home while enemies try to stop you. You want ur mango juice and u will do anything for it.Kill The Blobs to win. Enjoy!(P.S. I uploaded the full version if you want MORE FUN check that one out not this one link:https://2ddevstuff.itch.io/kill-the-blobs-full-version check it now!)

Wondering how to exit the game? Just click the windows button on the keyboard and manually close it. 

Controls:

To Move use A and D(or arrow Keys)

Spacebar To Jump

To kill enemies, jump on top of them and kick them to the void lol.

Please Write your opinions about the game in the comment section down below. Peace!!
